label: 山県有朋
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
見出し読み: やまがた ありとも
説明文: (1838-1922). Choshu ashigaru. Succeeded to command of Kiheitai; supported Takasugi Shinsaku in seizure of power, 1865. Offices in Choshu, then Meiji government; became outstanding figure of late Meiji period; Prime Minister; Genro.
